title: The Lego Group
summary: Lego System, Inc. A.S (trade name: The Lego Group, Inc. A.S) is a Danish toy production company based in Billund.[5] It manufactures Lego-brand toys, consisting mostly of interlocking plastic bricks. The Lego Group has also built several amusement parks around the world, each known as Legoland, and operates numerous retail stores.
